verbose_text: The majority of cases of vincristine induced VCP have been reported in the pediatric population.1, 2 Very few cases have been reported in the adult population.1 It is also noted that vincristine induced neurotoxicity tends to be related to dose intensity and a cumulative dose effect.1 Despite the unsettled mechanism of vincristine induced neuropathy, neuroprotective and neuroregenerative treatment efforts have been attempted.
